Functions
DEBUG_INIT
inline void DEBUG_INIT()

Initialize Debug module.

DEBUG_BREAK
inline void DEBUG_BREAK()

Force a break point.  Supported emulators: Emulicious, openMSX (with TLC script)

DEBUG_ASSERT
inline void DEBUG_ASSERT(
bool a
)

Conditionnal break.  Supported emulators: Emulicious, openMSX (with TLC script)

Parameters
a
bool

Value to check. Break occurs if a is FALSE.

DEBUG_LOG
inline void DEBUG_LOG(
const c8* str
)

Display debug message.  Supported emulators: Emulicious, openMSX

Parameters
str
const c8*

Null terminated string to display.

DEBUG_LOGNUM
inline void DEBUG_LOGNUM(
const c8* str,
u8 val
)

Display debug message and a 8-bits value.  Supported emulators: openMSX

Parameters
str
const c8*

Null terminated string to display.

val
u8

8 bits value to display.

PROFILE_FRAME_START
inline void PROFILE_FRAME_START()

Signal the start of a frame to be measured.  Supported emulators: openMSX (with TLC script)

PROFILE_FRAME_END
inline void PROFILE_FRAME_END()

Signal the end of a section to be measured.  Supported emulators: openMSX (with TLC script)

PROFILE_SECTION_START
inline void PROFILE_SECTION_START(
u8 id,
u8 level
)

Signal the start of a section to be measured.  Supported emulators: openMSX (with TLC script)

Parameters
id
u8

Section ID.

level
u8

Profile level (section start only if level is less or equal to PROFILE_LEVEL).

PROFILE_SECTION_END
inline void PROFILE_SECTION_END(
u8 id,
u8 level
)

Signal the end of a section to be measured.  Supported emulators: openMSX (with TLC script)

Parameters
id
u8

Section ID.

level
u8

Profile level (section end only if level is less or equal to PROFILE_LEVEL).
